snippet: Justice Milton A. Tingling of State Supreme Court in Manhattan has displayed a keen sensitivity to the clout of government, and a willingness to push back when it may be going too far.
abstract: Profile of Justice Milton A Tingling Jr of State Supreme Court in Manhattan, whose surprise rejection of New York City’s ban on large servings of sugary drinks is perhaps his highest-profile ruling.
lead_paragraph: Justice Milton A. Tingling of State Supreme Court in Manhattan has displayed a keen sensitivity to the clout of government, and a willingness to push back when it may be going too far.

headline.seo: Judge in Soda Ruling Is Wary of Government’s Power
headline.main: Judge in Soda Ruling Is Wary of Government’s Power
headline.print_headline: Judge in Soda Decision Is Wary of Official Power
